div1.p: Hanson estimates funding needed from the International Health Board for the Peruvian yellow fever campaign, with the employees and salaries for the different locations listed.

div1.head: Report: Estimate for the Financial Participation of the International Health Board in the Yellow Fever Campaign in Peru, by Henry Hanson, [19--]
div1.opener:
COPY
to go with
Letter of April 29
ESTIMATE FOR THE FINANCIAL PARTICIPATION OF
THE INTERNATIONAL HEALTH BOARD IN THE
YELLOW FEVER CAMPAIGN IN PERU.
- - - -
div1.p:
It is proposed that The International Health Board shall parti-
cipate in the yellow fever campaign in the Department of Lambayeque to the
extent of three hundred fifteen Peruvian pounds monthly, by assuming the
following expenses to be paid from the funds voted by the said Board.

row.cell:
1. Supervising Inspector for the Department, salary
Mr. Morris Monroe Seeley.

2. Inspector, Assistant to Supervising Inspector, salary
Sr. Jorge Reyes.

3. Auditor for the Yellow Fever Commission, salary
Mr. Ever Guildstrand.

Secretary to the Commission, Central Office, salary
Sr. Jose B. Valencia.

5. Interpreter, salary
Sr. Arturo Rivera, U.

div1.p:
As a matter of contract Mr. M.M. Seeley and Mr. S. Guildstrand
have been engaged upon the condition that they receive salary and
expenses. Inspector Jorge Reyes by virtue of his duties taking him
constantly from place to place can not establish permanence of re-
sidence also receives expenses (traveling expenses and allowance for
maintenance).

Traveling expenses and maintenance of Auditor and
Inspectors and other miscellaneous expenses ..... Lp 105.0.00
